about_the_game:
CalfVR - The most inclusive free VR video platform with thousands of ultra HD VR videos including 3D, 180° and 360°, etc. Calf encourages users to create, record, and live-stream virtual reality (VR) content using a variety of VR devices and cameras. CalfVR can be envisioned as an immersive virtual reality rendition of TikTok!

【Numerous 3D VR videos】There are thousands of high-quality VR videos on CalfVR. Food, pets, life, beauties… You can find everything here!

【6K/8K ultra HD video quality】Enjoy a variety of 6K ultra-high-definition video scenes. CalfVR provides a visually surreal experience.

【Immersive and interactive experience】CalfVR enables you to partake in an incredibly interactive visual feast by allowing you to send bullet comments while watching videos.

【Uploading VR videos supported】CalfVR provides users with the capability to post and publish VR videos. Share your exciting life and get comments and likes.

CalfVR features:
➢ VR Video Player (2D/3D Player): Play all videos on your phone like in a movie theater
➢ VR Browser: Browse anything on the internet in VR
➢ VR Camera: Take pictures in VR
➢ VR Photo Gallery: Store and access your pictures and videos in VR
➢ VR 360 Photo Gallery: Store and access your 360 photos
➢ VR Store, Market, and Launcher: Browse for new apps and access all VR applications through VR
➢ Support of all stereo formats with side-by-side and over under frame packing;
➢ Media library with an option to add selected folders into favorites;
➢ Flexible playback settings
➢ Automatic pause if headset removed
➢ Supported video formats: 3D/360°/180°

name: CalfVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR is only supported via HTC ViveCosmos

short_description: CalfVR - The most inclusive free VR video platform with thousands of ultra HD VR videos including 3D, 180° and 360°, etc,
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
